Verses: 1 karththar Veettaik Kattaaraagil, Adhaik Kattugiravargalin Pirayaasam Virudhaa;
2 karththar Nagaraththaik Kaavaaraagil Kaavalaalar Vizhiththirukkiradhu Virudhaa.
3 neengal Adhigaalaiyil Ezhundhu, Nerappada Velaiyile Thariththu, Varuththaththin Appaththaich Aaappidugiradhum Virudhaa; Avare Thamakkup Piriyamaanavanukku Niththirai Alikkiraar.
4 idho, Pillaigal Karththaraal Varum Sudhandharam, Karppaththin Kani Avaraal Kidaikkum Balan.
5 vaalavayadhin Kumaarar Balavaan Kaiyilulla Ambugalukku Oppaayirukkiraargal.
6 avaigalaal Than Ambaraaththooniyai Nirappina Purushan Baakkiyavaan; Avargal Naanamadaiyaamal Olimugavaasalil Saththurukkalode Pesuvaargal.
